name: Axe, Bow & Staff
description: A fantasy battle scroller where in one moment you gracefully support your companions with magic and arrows, and the next you accidentally throw them into goblin mayhem.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Later Processor: 2GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 256MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Later Processor: Duo Core 3 GHz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 1024MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 300 MB available space
